profile:
Beaver Paving Ltd. is a full service asphalt paving and Interlocking company. Established in 1980, Beaver  Paving Ltd. has been operating as family run business for over 35 years. With the original owner who continues to oversee and be involved with all aspects of the business, they have earned a reputation as being an exemplary company who excels in providing quality performance and customer service.
 
OUR GUARANTEE 
Beaver Paving Ltd ,we individually design and engineer your driveway using the highest quality materials combining expertise with experience. Although residential driveways and commercial lot designs and projects may vary from client to client, specifications and skill are always guaranteed to be consistent; from the biggest job to the smallest. 
Beaver Paving provides a full 12 month written guarantee with every contract.
 
Our Services Include: 
*Residential Paving 
*Commercial Paving 
*Asphalt Paving Contracting 
*Driveway Extensions 
*Sub-base Excavation 
*Grading Work, Regrading and Compacting 
*Interlocking Work 
*Concrete Floors and Pads 
*Walkway Reconstruction 
*Parking Lots 
*Industrial Lots 
*Commercial Plazas 
*Condominium Laneways 
*Grinding / Pulverizing 
*Resurfacing 
*Patch Work 
*Asphalt Grindings 
*Catch Basin Installations 
*Painted Line Markings 
*Rural Laneways

profile:
Established in l978, Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. has built a reputation for
excellence - specializing in all facets of asphalt paving, concrete work and interlocking
stone.
Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. is a family owned and operated business. Continuing 40 years of experience in the paving business.
Since the beginning, the Company has served Metropolitan of Toronto residents earning respect within the business as one of the most professional and personal companies in the
industry.
With industrial and residential size equipment, no job is to small or big for Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. We use heavy duty equipment for best results.
In April, 2004 Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. was chosen as the business of the week in Toronto.
Customers deal directly with the owners of Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. and each member of the staff has at least l0 years paving experience.
Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. is fully insured and carries a performance bond and is registered with the Ministry of Consumer and Commercial Relations.
Nortown Paving & Construction Inc. is a member of the Better Business Bureau and the Toronto Builders Association.

Our business is built on satisfied customers. All work carries a one year guarantee.

profile:
Our Company
We at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. are passionate about the work we do. Our commitment is to work with our clients to provide the best and most effective solution to complete the project in a safe and timely manner. We are dedicated to providing our clients a high level of customer satisfaction and accurate professional advice.
 
Our Health and Safety Policy
Our policy at Canturk Paving and General Contracting Ltd. is to provide and maintain a safe and healthy working environment. Compliance with Health and Safety regulations are outlined in the Health and Safety Policy of Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. Our employees are trained yearly and certified to ensure in reducing the risk of injuries in the workplace by following our policy.
 
Our Guarantee
We Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. construct each project using the highest quality materials, while providing the highest level of expertise and customer service. Even though each project varies from client to client, we provide quality service no matter the size of the project. Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. offers a written gurantee of 12 months from the date of completion.
services:
Asphalt Paving Services
Canturk Contracting Ltd. constructs asphalt pavements for property owners who desire affordable and high quality paving materials. Asphalt is durable and weather resistant, assuring maintenance and repairs are minimal. Unlike other poured materials asphalt is easy to install, therefore saving you hundreds of dollars in labor costs.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following asphalt services:

Parking Lots
Driveways
Walkways
Resurfacing
Patching
Speed Bumps
Trenches
Seal Coating
Crack Filling
Catch Basins
Line Marking
********************************
CONCRETE 
Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. offers a wide variety of concrete services. We are trained and skilled in all aspects of concrete projects. Concrete is being one of the oldest and most commonly used construction materials which possess countless benefits, along with being durable and relatively low maintenance. Concrete is reliable and has a long lifespan.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following concrete services:

Regular Concrete
Pattern Concrete
Colour Concrete
Standard Curbs
French Curbs
Garage Floors
Garbage Pads
Jewel Stone
********************************
Interlock Paving Services
Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. specializes in designing and implementing interlocking stone. We can construct a wide variety of outdoor spaces, including but not limited to driveways. Interlocking can make any outdoor space aesthetically pleasing with great quality stones. We work with our clients to design their layout and are also available to assist with selection of products and other aspects of the project.

Our professional team at Canturk Paving & General Contracting Ltd. provide the following interlock services:

Interlocking Stone
Interlocking Steps
Interlocking Porches
Retaining Walls
Stone Waterfalls
Natural Flagstone
Masonry Repairs
Driveways
Walkways
Patios
Outdoor Kitchens (BBQs)
Fireplaces

profile:
Iconic Paving Goes Above and Beyond to Bring Our Customers the Best Quality Product and Service
We listen to your vision, show you our ideas, and make necessary recommendations to ensure your project is completed on time, within budget and with 100% accuracy. Whether we’re building a new parking lot, repaving a driveway, providing concrete solutions or adding an interlock feature, we will transform your property into a functional space that adds value and beauty to your property.

For all your asphalt paving, concrete or interlock needs, the Iconic Paving team is here for you. With over 20 years of experience, the modern fleet and equipment to get the jobs done with precision, and a team with the right attitude, we ensure every project is done right every time.

With our focus on experienced people, safety, and environmental responsibility, you get quality and professional paving results the first time - all of our work is fully guaranteed.

profile: Welcome to Osaz sealing, an asphalt maintenance company that takes pride in every project we take on. Based in Toronto and the GTA, we specialize in a wide range of services dealing with asphalt problems on residential driveways and commercial parking lots. Our Priority is providing the highest quality services with great workmanship, trust and outstanding customer satisfaction. Visit our website www.osazsealing.ca to find out more or just call 647 401 9385 today for a ***free quote***

Hot Mix Asphalt Repair,

line Painting
